techCategories.title: Tech Categories
techCategories.description: An array of broad tech categories, into which techs can be placed

items.title: Tech Category
items.description: A category of techs, that contains several techs

name.title: Tech Category Name
name.description: The name of this tech category

description.title: Tech Category Description
description.description: A description for this tech category

techs.title: Super Metroid Techs
techs.description: An array of techs, each representing an in-game technique and the requirements for performing it. Any such technique could feasibly be turned off for randomizer logic.

items.title: Tech
items.description: A tech that represents an in-game technique and the requirements for performing it

id.title: Tech ID
id.description: Identifier for this tech, unique across all tech.

name.title: Tech Name
name.description: The name of this tech, to be referenced in logical requirements

techRequires.title: Tech Requirements
techRequires.description: Dependent tech required for this tech.

otherRequires.title: Other Requirements
otherRequires.description: Other requirements to perform this tech, such as items or ammo.

extensionTechs.title: Extension techs
extensionTechs.description: An array of extension techs. An extension tech is a more complex version of its parent tech. Its requirements stand alone and explicitly require the parent tech, but it's positioned under the parent to provide hints for cleaning up a tech UI.
